properties.areaDesc: North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet/Denver/West Adams and Arapahoe Counties/East Broomfield County; Elbert/Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet/West Broomfield County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 1 at 9:18PM MST until March 2 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Denver CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mainly light snow will continue overnight. A few bands of
moderate snow are possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6
inches are expected, the highest amounts over Broomfield and
the Palmer Ridge.

* WHERE...Boulder and the western suburbs of Denver, Denver and
Castle Rock.

* WHEN...Now through 5 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on roads becoming slippery this evening with icy
and slushy roadways and possibly snowpacked by late evening.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY
